title.narrative: 2019 Project - Support to the Ministry of Economy, Planning and Cooperation of Senegal on Inclusive Growth Towards Youth Employment

description.narrative:
MEPC will host a coordination platform for youth employment activities, by supporting a permanent secretariat to lead coordination efforts. MCF will provide one consultant to support the secretariat. The mandate, composition and other criteria for the platform will be co-designed with MEPC, the ministry in charge of labor (Ministère de l’Emploi, de la Formation Professionnelle et de l’Artisanat, MEFPA), and other key actors such as the Délégation à l’Entreprenariat Rapide, DER.
MEPC will stand private sector development and public-private partnerships departments within MEPC, with MCF funding for some of the positions, including one director general, two directors, and two analysts. Further, three students from ENSEA will be recruited, onboarded and trained by MEPC to support the implementation of the PPP and private sector projects. This approach will allow MEPC to start building a pool of talent. Additional expertise will progressively be allocated by MEPC

participating-org.narrative: Ministère de l'Economie, du Plan et de la Coopération (MEPC)
